reading_texts.title: Paris and the Eiffel Tower
reading_texts.content:
France is a beautiful country in Western Europe with a rich history and culture. Paris, the capital of France, is known for its art, fashion, and cuisine. The city attracts millions of tourists every year who come to see its famous landmarks.

One of the most iconic landmarks in Paris is the Eiffel Tower. This iron lattice tower was designed by Gustave Eiffel and completed in 1889 for the World's Fair. At the time of its construction, it was the tallest structure in the world, standing at 300 meters tall.

Today, the Eiffel Tower remains one of the most visited paid monuments in the world, with nearly 7 million visitors annually. It has become a global cultural icon of France and one of the most recognizable structures in the world.
